bibl.title: Small-Format Photography of Carbonized Papyri.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Wall, Elbert Walker

bibl.note: The American Center of the International Photographic Archive of Papyri has found two techniques for successful photography of fully carbonized papyri which will not respond to the usual photographic processes.
Wall Elbert Walker, Small-Format Photography of Carbonized Papyri.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 677-680.
